text.$invariant:
Choosing the right sectional garage door is crucial for your business's needs and budget. At Automatic Technology, we can help you find the perfect door to fit your requirements. Automating your commercial or industrial sectional garage door can make entering and exiting your business more convenient, while also enhancing the security of your property and ensuring the safety of your employees.

What sets Automatic Technology overhead door openers apart?

contentData.description: Automatic Technology overhead door openers ensure the safety of your employees and premises.
contentData.heading: Protect Your Business

contentData.description: Built-in automatic reversing smarts detect obstructions and automatically reverse the door to prevent accidents.
contentData.heading: Automatic Smarts

contentData.description: Automatic back drive forces the door back down if it senses an intruder is trying to lift the door, providing an extra layer of security for your business.
contentData.heading: Prevent Unwanted Entry

contentData.description: Easy and reliable installation ensures that your commercial or industrial sectional overhead door can be operated smoothly day in and day out for many years to come.
contentData.heading: Easy to Install

contentData.description: Soft start and stop technology reduces stress on the opener, which allows the door to open and close both quickly and quietly year after year, not just when it’s installed.
contentData.heading: Stress Tested for Durability

contentData.description: Safety reminders in the form of audio and visual cues let you know when the opener is ready for servicing.
contentData.heading: Safety and Maintenance Reminders

contentData.description: Choose Automatic Technology sectional overhead door openers to ensure the safety and security of your business, while enjoying the convenience and reliability of automatic door operation
contentData.heading: Convenience and Reliability
Proven, Smooth Operation
contentData.description: Soft start and stop technology reduces stress on the operator, which allows the door to open and close both quickly and quietly year after year, not just when it’s installed.
